questions.moduleDescription: measure and calculate the perimeter of a rectilinear figure (including squares) in centimetres and metres
questions.questionText: Let's trace the perimeter of a T-shape (10x2 top bar, 2x8 stem centered). Top edge=10. Right edge=2. Underside of bar=4. Right side of stem=8. Bottom of stem=2. Left side of stem=8. Left underside of bar=4. Left edge=2. Total=10+2+4+8+2+8+4+2 = 40m.

questionData.originalText: Let's trace the perimeter of a T-shape (10x2 top bar, 2x8 stem centered). Top edge=10. Right edge=2. Underside of bar=4. Right side of stem=8. Bottom of stem=2. Left side of stem=8. Left underside of bar=4. Left edge=2. Total=10+2+4+8+2+8+4+2 = 40m.
